attributes.action: lower the legal voting age to 16
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to do this as the younger generation should have a right to control their future government and to have a say in referendums and elections. As well as this, lowering the age may get the younger generation to take an active involvement role in democracy and politics.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to consider lowering the legal voting age from 18 to 16.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642894
